property.name: mount-point
property.description: The mount point the stream is to be produced on

property.name: type
property.description: 'master' to listen on a port, or 'slave' to slave to a porter, or 'pull' to pull from an encoder (default master)

property.name: bouncer
property.description: Name of bouncer to use for authentication

property.name: ignore-keyframes
property.description: Treat all data as keyframes, ignoring markers in the stream

property.name: port
property.description: Port to listen on (if type is 'master'), or port to connect to for 'pull' mode

property.name: host
property.description: Hostname to connect to in pull mode

property.name: porter-socket-path
property.description: Path to the socket to communicate with the porter

property.name: porter-username
property.description: Username to authenticate with to the porter

property.name: porter-password
property.description: Password to authenticate with to the porter

property.name: filename
property.description: Name of file containing usernames and password hashes
